sn47.3:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn47.3:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn47.3:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn47.3:1.4: “Evameva panidhekacce moghapurisa manceva ajjhesanti, dhamme ca bhasite mameva anubandhitabbam mannanti”ti.
sn47.3:1.5: “Desetu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam, desetu sugato sankhittena dhammam. Appeva namaham bhagavato bhasitassa attham janeyyam, appeva namaham bhagavato bhasitassa dayado assan”ti.
sn47.3:1.6: “Tasmatiha tvam, bhikkhu, adimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
sn47.3:1.9: Yato kho te, bhikkhu, silanca suvisuddham bhavissati ditthi ca ujuka, tato tvam, bhikkhu, silam nissaya sile patitthaya cattaro satipatthane tividhena bhaveyyasi.
sn47.3:2.2: Idha tvam, bhikkhu, ajjhattam va kaye kayanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.3:2.3: bahiddha va kaye kayanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.3:2.4: ajjhattabahiddha va kaye kayanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.3:2.7: ajjhattabahiddha va vedanasu vedananupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.3:2.10: ajjhattabahiddha va citte cittanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.3:2.13: ajjhattabahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.3:2.14: Yato kho tvam, bhikkhu, silam nissaya sile patitthaya ime cattaro satipatthane evam tividhena bhavessasi, tato tuyham, bhikkhu, ya ratti va divaso va agamissati vuddhiyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu, no parihani”ti.
sn47.3:3.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn47.3:3.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
sn47.3:3.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn47.3:3.4: Annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
